HomePage.title: Welcome!
HomePage.aboutProjectText: Our project is a tool for working with APIs, inspired by Postman.
HomePage.teamLeadDescription: She leads the process, distributes tasks, and inspires.
HomePage.dev1Description: Frontend developer, loves to come up with new features.
HomePage.dev2Description: Frontend developer, writes code and maintains stability.
HomePage.aboutCourseText: We are developing this project as part of our training to improve our teamwork and development skills.

NotFoundPage.title: 404 - Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

ErrorPage.title: Something went wrong
ErrorPage.description: Try refreshing the page or go back to the home page.
